str2: A day, the period from sunrise to sunset.

str2: To go out, come out. From ek and erchomai; to issue.
A primary preposition; to or into, of place, time, or purpose; also in adverbial phrases.
Apparently a primary word; a spot, i.e. Location; figuratively, condition, opportunity; specially, a scabbard.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From a derivative of echo; a throng; by implication, the rabble; by extension, a class of people; figuratively, a riot.

str2: To seek after, desire, search for, make inquiries about. From epi and zeteo; to search for; intensively, to demand, to crave.
